articles.description: Joseph Chapman was in attendance - here are the talking points from an afternoon at The Hawthorns
articles.content:
West Brom have gone from famine to feast in front of goal.
After four matches without a goal, either side of the break caused by the pandemic, Slaven Bilics Albion have opened the floodgates and hav… [+4693 chars]
